Package ocremixupdater

Class Summary
DBAccessThread A SwingWorker thread for performing various database operations in the background and displaying the results asynchronously on the main window.
DoubleFileName Stores two Strings: a file name and a "reduced" file name, with special characters removed and all run together.
Downloader The window that shows the download progress, either for list pages or mp3s.
ListDownloaderThread A SwingWorker thread that downloads ReMix list pages.
Mirror A mirror to download OC ReMixes from.
MirrorWindow A window to let the user edit the mirrors to download ReMixes from.
MP3DownloaderThread A SwingWorker thread that downloads ReMixes.
OCReMix Represents a single OC ReMix, including its number, file name, whether the user has it on disk or not, and whether the user wants to download it or not.
OCRemixUpdaterApp The main class of the application.
OCRemixUpdaterView Main window of OCRemixUpdater.
ReMixDatabase A database holding records for OC ReMixes.
 

Enum Summary
DBAccessThread.DBMode
